name: tsim1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: mpbir(wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))), wo(wi(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))

body.origin:
|- wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wi(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))), wo(wi(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wo(wi(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))), wo(wi(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))

|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))), wo(wi(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))

stmt.origin: orbi1i(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2)), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))), wo(wi(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(wn(w1), w2), wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(wn(w1), w2), wi(w1, w2))

stmt.origin: bitri(wo(wn(w1), w2), wi(w1, w2), wi(wn(wn(w1)), w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wn(w1), w2), wi(w1, w2))
-| wb(wo(wn(w1), w2), wi(wn(wn(w1)), w2))
-| wb(wi(wn(wn(w1)), w2), wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(wn(w1), w2), wi(wn(wn(w1)), w2))
-| wb(wi(wn(wn(w1)), w2), wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wi(wn(wn(w1)), w2), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(wn(wn(w1)), w2), wi(w1, w2))
-| wb(wn(wn(w1)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wn(wn(w1)), w1)

|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
-| wb(w1, wn(wn(w1)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical implication, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
